lyrics:
Every morning when the dayâ€™s begun
I thank the Lord for all He has done.
Every evening when I kneel to pray,
I thank the Lord for another day.

Thank you for the sun, my Lord; Thank you for the moon
Thank you for the day and night, morning and afternoon.
Thank you for the waters, Lord; the rains that soak the ground.
Thank you for the rivers, Lord; fishes that swim around.
